functions.name: Get Data from GraphQL Endpoint
functions.description: Returns query data from a GraphQL endpoint

args.name: Enter jmesPathQuery Query for the array of address data.
args.example: e.g. mintedBadges[].owner.id (remove `data` from the beginning of the query result. You can test your query on the jmespath website https://jmespath.org/. End result should be an array of addresses e.g. [`0x..234`,`0x...123`])
args.description: Instructions for testing the JMESPath can be found here: https://www.sampolgar.com/hidden/jmespath
